lyrics.text:
Sīsū ko hoku mālohi,
Ke ke ‘Afio mai
He ‘oku ou mo’ua lahi
‘I he ‘ahi’ahi.

Ka ko hoku unga’anga,
‘A e ‘Afiona
‘I he’eku faingata’a
Mo e mafasia.

Pea ‘oku ke ongo’i
‘Eku fa’a lotu,
Mo ke anga’ofa lahi
Ki he kakai ‘o ‘ou.

Ke ke tuku kiate au
‘A e fa’a tatali,
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona
Pea u lava’i ai.

’A hono fa’a kātaki
‘I he loto lelei,
‘A e me’a kotoa pē
Kuo tu’utu’uni.

’Oku māfimafi koe
Ki he Fakatupu,
Pea mo e fakafo’ou
Ho’o ngāue ‘a ‘au.
